description: A PHP script generating an HTML page for a restaurant menu, including database connection, data retrieval, and display of menu items with images.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the MySQL database.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Executes a query against the database.

methods.name: mysqli_fetch_array
methods.description: Fetches a result row as an associative array.

methods.name: mysqli_num_rows
methods.description: Returns the number of rows in a result set.

methods.name: mysqli_connect_error
methods.description: Returns the error description from the last connection error.
